item.title: Amulet of glory..[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Evo2 Evo_
item.description:
@Evo2 wrote:

I’m having problems with the glory, when I use it to teleport somewere, it doesn’t reduce to teleports
Example, if it’s charged (2) and I teleport, it stays (2)
Here’s my code…

[code] public void secondClickItem()
{
int i = inStream.readSignedWordA();
int j = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
int k = inStream.readSignedWordA();
int l = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
boolean flag = false;
boolean flag1 = false;
switch(k)
{
case 1712:
gloryId = 1712;
newGloryId = 1710;
glory();
break;

    case 1710: 
            gloryId = 1710;
            newGloryId = 1708;
            glory();
        	break;

    case 1708: 
            gloryId = 1708;
            newGloryId = 1706;
            glory();
        	break;

    case 1706: 
            gloryId = 1706;
            newGloryId = 1704;
            glory();
        	break;

    case 1704:

sM(“Your Amulet of glory is out of charge, Recharge at the edgeville Altar.”);
break;[/code]
